page.title: 09ST MAWGAN PLAYGROUP
page.content: St Mawgan playgroup is for children who are 2\ to 4\ years old. About 20 children go to St Josephs Hall on Monday, Wednesday and Friday mornings, from 9.15 to 11.45am. Mrs Adams the organiser has three lady helpers . The children use a sandpit, wendy house, rocking horse, slide, trampoline, reading, painting, books, card games, puzzles, balls, hoops, Lego for models and clay. They can cook buns and biscuits and walk to Polgreen, through Carnanton Woods or to the playing field.The children all seemed very happy. Eight mums help raise funds by coffee mornings which normally raise Â£20,an egg stall which raises Â£17. Recently they had a knit- in, all the sponsor money went to the playgroup and the knitting to the Ethiopian appeal. The money bought new tables and a Duplo train.
